name: Overkill
description: Replace secondary with any primary not in use.

name: Primary Gunfighter 1
description: Unlocks 1 additional attachment slot for your primary weapon.

name: Primary Gunfighter 2
description: Unlocks 1 additional attachment slot for your primary weapon.

name: Primary Gunfighter 3
description: Unlocks 1 additional attachment slot for your primary weapon.

name: Primary Operator Mod
description: Unlocks the Operator Mod slot for your primary weapon.

name: Underkill
description: Replace primary with any secondary not in use.

name: Secondary Gunfighter 1
description: Unlocks 1 additional attachment slot for your secondary weapon.

name: Secondary Gunfighter 2
description: Unlocks 1 additional attachment slot for your secondary weapon.

name: Secondary Gunfighter 3
description: Unlocks 1 additional attachment slot for your secondary weapon.

name: Secondary Operator Mod
description: Unlocks the Operator Mod slot for your secondary weapon.

name: Perk 1 Gluttony
description: Use all three perk slots to select perks from Perk 1.

name: Perk 2 Gluttony
description: Use all three perk slots to select perks from Perk 2.

name: Perk 3 Gluttony
description: Use all three perk slots to select perks from Perk 3.
